ESP. – NIT. 860.063.875-6 – Calle 93 No 13-45 P1 – Bogotá, Colombia – C +571 601 6060 – www.enel.com.co Pag 1 de 2 INTERNAL Septiembre, 2022 CERTIFICACIÓN DE COMPOSICIÓN ACCIONARIA Mediante la presente certifico que la composición de ENEL COLOMBIA S.A. ESP identificada con NIT. 860.063.875-8, es la siguiente: Accionista No. Acciones % Participación ENEL AMERICAS S.A. NIT. 900.283.352-6 85.394.808 57,345% GRUPO ENERGÍA BOGOTÁ S.A. E.S.P. NIT 899.999.082-3 63.311.437 42,515% OTROS ACCIONISTAS MINORITARIOS 207.917 0,140% TOTAL 148.914.162 100% Teniendo en cuenta la solicitud particular de desglose de participación accionaria de los accionistas GRUPO ENERGIA BOGOTA S.A. E.S.P. y ENEL AMÉRICAS SA, la administración de la sociedad manifiesta que no tiene control sobre el registro actualizado de la composición accionaria de dichas sociedades, por lo que no es posible realizar certificación en tal sentido. Sin perjuicio de lo anterior, por medio de la presente se relaciona links de acceso a información de composición accionaria que dichos accionistas han hecho pública: • GRUPO ENERGÍA DE BOGOTÁ SA ESP https://grupoenergiabogota.com/informedesostenibilidadgeb2020/gobiernocorporativo.html

content.thinking: Let me analyze this document step by step: 1. **TEXT EXTRACTION** Looking at the document, I can extract the following readable text: The document appears to be in Spanish and is titled "CERTIFICACIÓN DE COMPOSICIÓN ACCIONARIA" (Shareholding Composition Certification). Key elements I can see: - Company: ENEL COLOMBIA S.A. ESP. - NIT: 860.063.875-6 and later 860.063.875-8 - Date: September 2022 - This is a certification of shareholding composition - Shareholding structure showing: - ENEL AMERICAS S.A. (NIT 900.283.352-6): 85.394.808 shares, 57.345% - GRUPO ENERGÍA BOGOTÁ S.A. E.S.P. (NIT 899.999.082-3): 63.311.437 shares, 42.515% - OTROS ACCIONISTAS MINORITARIOS: 207.917 shares, 0.140% - TOTAL: 148.914.162 shares, 100% The document also mentions that they cannot provide breakdown of the shareholding composition of the shareholders GRUPO ENERGIA BOGOTA S.A. E.S.P. and ENEL AMÉRICAS SA because the company administration doesn't have control over the updated registry of the shareholding composition of those companies. It provides a link to public information about shareholding composition. 2. **PRIORITY CHECKS** - This is not BLANK - it has substantial meaningful content - This is not LINK_ONLY - while it mentions a link, the primary content is the shareholding certification itself 3. **ISSUER IDENTIFICATION** This is issued by ENEL COLOMBIA S.A. ESP., which is a corporate entity, not DIAN or Chamber of Commerce. 4. **DOCUMENT FUNCTION ANALYSIS** This is clearly corporate documentation focused on ownership structure. 5. **CATEGORY CLASSIFICATION** I recognize this as an ownership certification document. The ACC category perfectly captures its nature, detailing precise shareholder percentages and ownership breakdown. The document provides a clear snapshot of the company's equity structure, highlighting major shareholders and their respective stakes. The certification reveals a two-primary-shareholder structure with ENEL AMERICAS and GRUPO ENERGÍA BOGOTÁ dominating the ownership, complemented by a small percentage of minority shareholders.
